summary:
Realistic Blacksmith items and objects in HD!
Modification changes models, textures, physics, collisions and effects on more realistic in HD.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][b][color=#ff0000][size=6]Realistic Blacksmith in HD![/size]

[/color][/b]
[size=5][color=#00ff00]Modification changes:[/color]
[/size]
[size=3] - Models (remodeled and smoothed)
 - Textures (diffuse, normal, specular, environment)
 - Physics (more realistic)
 - Effects (normal, specular, environment)


[/size][color=#00ff00][size=5]What blacksmith items and objects are changed:
[/size][/color][size=4][color=#b45f06]- Anvil[/color]
[color=#6d9eeb]- Hammer[/color]
[color=#6fa8dc]- Tongs[/color][/size]



[color=#ff0000][size=5]Soon:[/size][/color]
[color=#e69138][size=4]- 2 new Anvil variants (Skyforge, Whiterun)
[/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=4]- Forge (3 variants)
[/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=4]- Sharpening Wheel
- Workbench
- Smelter
[/size][/color][color=#ffd966][size=4]
and more...[/size][/color]



[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4]Instalation:[/size]
[/color]
[/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]Copy the Data folder and overwrite it with the existing one in the main game folder.
[/font][/size]


[/font][/center][center][img]https://i.imgur.com/DPZBj9Q.jpg[/img]
